59/*
60 * Udp protocol header.
61 * Per RFC 768, September, 1981.
62 */
63struct udphdr {
64 u_int16_t uh_sport; /* source port */
65 u_int16_t uh_dport; /* destination port */
66 u_int16_t uh_ulen; /* udp length */
67 u_int16_t uh_sum; /* udp checksum */
68};
69
